heroPrimaryDefault: All-in-one, cloud based Property</br><span class='whitespace-nowrap'>Management Solution<span>
registeredModalParagraph: We will reach out to you soon
solutionParagraphA: GoPMS is the most convenient product for the property management system.
solutionParagraphB: We provide a convenient experience for hotel managers.
pricingDesc: GoPMS provides the right solution for more efficient property management
faqQuestion1: What makes GoPMS stand apart from other services?
faqAnswer1: GoPMS is a localized system for small and middle-sized properties with customized services.
faqQuestion2: How do I get my account to have access to GoPMS?
faqAnswer2: We provide the accommodation account after the verification procedures.
faqQuestion3: Is there any paid function in GoPMS?
faqAnswer3: No. Currently, all functions of GoPMS provides for free. If there is any update in the future, we will notify you in advance.
marketingAgreement: I agree to receive marketing communication from GoPMS
footerParagraph: GoPMS is an all-in-one cloud-based Property Management Solution for hourly-based accommodation
features_2_desc: With GoPMS, all staffs can manage and check the property status in dashboard / timeline
features_3_desc: Customized Report provides transparent data by stay-type and gains business insight
faqQuestion4: What is the GoPMS Contact information?
faqAnswer4: You can send an email to info{'@'}gopms.io or use Zalo hotline on the website.
